name: Battleship (itch) (Nic Can't Code)
description:
Welcome to Battleship!

This is the first game of many I plan to make in order to build out and expand my own personal portfolio of games.

I spent approximately 51 hours and 30 minutes on this project and will edit and link a time lapse of that process accompanied with a narration of the problems I ran into and how I solved them (or in some cases, didn't!).

As an aspiring game developer, I appreciate anyone who plays this game, small though it may be!
